text: Ba phalalisitsoeng malapeng a bona hobane ba itse: “Mong`a rona ke Allah,” na ha se Allah ea thibang lehlakore le leng la batho ka le leng, Ruri! Ho ka be ho ile ha heletsoa Litempele, Likereke, li-Sinakhokhe le li-Mosque moo lebitso la Allah le tlotlisoang ka mehla eohle. Allah U thusa ea mo thusang. Hobane Allah U Matla Oohle, U Ts’abehile Matleng, –
